Bash.help: You Bash with your mace dealing moderate Smashing damage and minor Toxic damage over time.
Bash.shortHelp: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Minor Disorient
Bash.targetHelp: You have been disoriented and poisoned.

Pulverize.help: You Pulverize with your mace dealing high Smashing damage and minor Toxic damage over time.
Pulverize.shortHelp: Melee, High DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Minor Disorient
Pulverize.targetHelp: You have been disoriented and poisoned.

Clobber.help: You Clobber your foe's head in order to Disorient him. This attack does little damage on its own, but can leave most opponents Disoriented for a very long time.
Clobber.shortHelp: Melee, Minor DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Disorient
Clobber.targetHelp: You have been disoriented and poisoned.

Whirling_Mace.help: You swing your mace in a circle all around you, attacking everyone in melee range. Your Whirling Mace deals moderate damage and minor Toxic damage over time, and has a chance to Disorient every foe you hit.
Whirling_Mace.shortHelp: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Minor Disorient
Whirling_Mace.targetHelp: You have been disoriented and poisoned.

Crowd_Control.help: You swing your mace in a wide arc in front of you. This attack strikes all foes within melee range, deals them serious damage and minor Toxic damage over time, and knocks them down.
Crowd_Control.shortHelp: Melee (Cone), Moderate DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Knockback

Poisonous_Ray_Burst.help: You fire a Poisonous Ray from your mace.
Poisonous_Ray_Burst.targetHelp: You have been poisoned and your defense has been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.

Mace_Beam_Volley.help: The Nullifier Mace is capable of firing a tremendous bolt of force from the end of it. Arachnos Troopers call this the Power Blast, the Arbiters who invented it scoff at this simple term.
Mace_Beam_Volley.shortHelp: Cone Ranged, Moderate DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockback

Mace_Beam_Blast.help: The Nullifier Mace is capable of firing a tremendous bolt of force from the end of it. Arachnos Troopers call this the Power Blast, the Arbiters who invented it scoff at this simple term.
Mace_Beam_Blast.shortHelp: AoE Ranged, High DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockback

Wide_Area_Web_Grenade.help: Upon impact, the Web Grenade expels a strong, tenuous, and very sticky substance that can Immobilize most targets. This non-lethal device deals no damage and does not prevent targets from attacking, although their attack rate is Slowed. The Web can bring down flying entities and halts jumping.
Wide_Area_Web_Grenade.targetHelp: You have been caught in a web. You cannot move or fly and your attack speed is reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You Immobilize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Immobilizes you with their {PowerName}.

Cocoon.help: Envelopes the target in a cocoon of webs. They are held helpless and unable to act.

messages.attackerHit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.
